level.text: The following vehicles shall be exempt from the purchase requirements contained in this chapter:
Any vehicle greater than twenty-six thousand pounds (26,000 lbs.) GVWR;
Vehicles in fleets operating in the covered area with fewer than ten (10) vehicles;
Vehicles in a covered fleet not capable of being centrally fueled;
Vehicles which are garaged under normal operations at a personal residence;
Vehicles leased or rented to the general public;
Vehicles used for product demonstrations and tests.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Section 3(a) of the Clean Fuel Fleet Vehicle Program and Alternative Fuels Incentives Amendment Act of 1994, D.C. Law 10-201, 41 DCR 7178, 7189 (November 4, 1994).
